attributes.action: Provide funding for rehabilitation facilities for injured troops,rather than through charity appeal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I was shocked to learn that money was having to be raised through charity donations, to provide facilities for the rehabilitation of our injured troops.  Surely the Government should be only too willing to provide the £6 million required, indeed it is it's duty!!  
   About this charity: 
H4H provides support for wounded servicemen and women injured during the course of their duty. It is a short term charity appeal with an urgent need to raise 6 million to fund the construction of a swimming pool and gymnasium complex at Headley Court, the tri-service rehabilitation centre in Leatherhead.
